title: Bobby Makes A Statement With His CMT Awards Outfit + Trisha Yearwood Stops By
itunes:title: Bobby Makes A Statement With His CMT Awards Outfit + Trisha Yearwood Stops By
description:
Bobby recaps his night at the 2019 CMT Awards, along with why he chose to wear the outfits he did. Trisha Yearwood stops by to World Premiere her new single “Every Girl In This Town.” Also, Crazy Ray the Weather Guy makes a comeback.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
